name: panda-cash
description: The vision of Panda Cash is to make Bitcoin Cash easily accessible to every developer.

scripts.start:bitbox: NETWORK=mainnet BITCOINCOM_BASEURL=https://test.bch.api.bitcoindotcom.net/api/ RPC_BASEURL=http://127.0.1.0:18332 RPC_PASSWORD= RPC_USERNAME=bitcoin ZEROMQ_PORT=0 ZEROMQ_URL=0 BITDB_TOKEN=0 node ./node_modules/bitbox-sdk/index.js
